title: Design-Centered SPOC Blended Learning-Based Digital Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Kindergarten Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and possession of pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment construction using digital devices, with an assessment system linked to a micro-credentialing framework.

learning_goals: Measure competency in designing kindergarten lessons using digital tools (achieving ≥4.0 on a 5-point scale)
Complete the digital content creation and implementation process in a PBL environment (100% project deliverables submission)
Demonstrate ≥20% improvement in at least three core digital competency (KDC) items through self-assessment

resources: Digital Production Tools (Canva, Adobe Spark, etc.)
Digital Content Template for Early Childhood Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
